content.text:
# President of the Regional Government of Extremadura

|insignia        = Flag of Extremadura, Spain.svg
|insigniasize    = 100px
|insigniacaption = Flag of Extremadura
|image           =
|incumbent       = María Guardiola

|residence       =

|formation       = 1978
|inaugural       = Luis Ramallo
|website         =
}}
The president of the Autonoumous Government of Extremadura () is the head of government of the Spanish autonomous community of Extremadura.
María Guardiola from the PP is the current president of the Government of Extremadura; she was elected with the support of Vox.
